A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To me this film was a master class in subverting expectations; throughout\, it would set up something that seemed cliche and obvious\, and then turn it on its head\, go a different direction. Because of this\, because it was able to be unexpected\, it felt real in a way most movies don't\, to me; I couldn't see where it was going and I was on the edge of my seat for most of the film. I loved every minute of it and can't wait to see it again.
